part_description: Three doors vertically aligned, each covering a compartment. Handles on the left side of each door.
internal_interaction_description: Each door opens to reveal a separate compartment, allowing for organized storage. The compartments are stacked vertically, with each door operating independently for access to individual sections.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, providing storage space in a room. Users can open doors to store or retrieve items, utilizing the handles for easy access.
